abstract: Hiroki Nakamura and his label Visvim have attracted devoted following with garments inspired by American work cloths and Zen simplicity.
lead_paragraph: Hiroki Nakamura, the founder of cult workwear favorite Visvim, lives the vintage life — carefully curated yet casually scuffed.

headline.main: A Japanese Designer With a Rugged Western Aesthetic

snippet: Hiroki Nakamura, the founder of cult workwear favorite Visvim, lives the vintage life — carefully curated yet casually scuffed.
